plays.text: Penalty to Robert Lang 2 minutes for High Sticking Steve McCarthy
Goal scored by Mikael Samuelsson assisted by Mathieu Schneider
Penalty to Andreas Lilja 2 minutes for Hooking Todd Bertuzzi
Penalty to Kris Draper 2 minutes for Hooking Ed Jovanovski
Penalty to Henrik Sedin 2 minutes for Holding Daniel Cleary
Penalty to Mattias Ohlund 2 minutes for Holding Henrik Zetterberg
Penalty to Steve McCarthy 2 minutes for Interference Kirk Maltby
Penalty to Brendan Morrison 2 minutes for Hooking Kris Draper
Goal scored by Matt Cooke unassisted
Penalty to Henrik Sedin 2 minutes for Tripping Kris Draper
Penalty to Matt Cooke 2 minutes for Kneeing Jason Williams
Goal scored by Henrik Sedin assisted by Mattias Ohlund AND Sami Salo
Penalty to Mathieu Schneider 2 minutes for Holding Daniel Sedin
Goal scored by Tomas Holmstrom assisted by Daniel Cleary AND Mark Mowers
Goal scored by Anson Carter assisted by Henrik Sedin AND Daniel Sedin
Penalty to Mathieu Schneider 2 minutes for Crosschecking Lee Goren
Penalty to Todd Bertuzzi 2 minutes for Slashing Chris Chelios
Penalty to Chris Chelios 2 minutes for Slashing Todd Bertuzzi
Goal scored by Richard Park assisted by Henrik Sedin
